question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. white sign says "feet"
B. red triangular sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white sign saying "feet" is mounted on a stone wall in the immediate foreground, while the red triangular sign is further back on a pole near the road, making the depth relationship very obvious.
